item.title: Simple Calculator Python
item.description: What? This simple calculator program will allow the user to enter two ( or more if you wish ) numbers and then choose a method to use (+, -, /, *). We will use if statements. How? Well, first we need to add 3 ( or more ) variables. The first two will be holding the user’s numbers and the third will be the method they want to use ( Both variables will be asking for the user’s input as well ).
